facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population below international poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line was approximately 0.2 % in 2012.

facts.seriesTitle: Employed population below international poverty line, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2012, 0.0 % of the country's workers and their families were living on less than 1.90 US dollars per person per day

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2013 , Republic of Korea has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was less than 2.5 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2010, 2.5 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 increased from 6.2 % in 2003 to 7.3% in 2010.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 21 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 11 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 7.5 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 3.3 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 16.5 % in 2000 to 7.8% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, 96.36279 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 3.6789 % in 2000 to 17% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed drinking water services, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 98.02417 % of the population used a "safely managed" drinking water service - an improved source located on premises, available when needed and free from contamination

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population using safely managed sanitation services, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2015, 98.46266 % of the population used a "safely managed" sanitation service - a basic facility that safely disposes of human waste

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity was 100.00 % in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , more than 95 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 15.74537 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 11.31634 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate declined from 4.4 % in 2000 to 3.7% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita declined from 8.09 % in 2000 to 2.68% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP (kilogrammes of CO2 per constant 2010 United States dollars)
facts.fact_text: The carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP decreased from 0.44 kilograms in 2000 to 0.33 kilograms in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Research and development expenditure as a proportion of GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , investment in research and development (R&D) stood at 4.23 % of GDP , up from 2.18 % in 2000

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 99.90 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Labour share of GDP, comprising wages and social protection transfers (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 58.7 % of GDP was from labour, comprising wages and social protection transfers

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 24.5724048614502 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2013 , Republic of Korea has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption decreased from 15.74537 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 11.31634 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2013 , Republic of Korea has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2018 , 1.63351 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest was 63.46144 % in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Freshwater Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of freshwater key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 36.78185 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 32.45863 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2015 , the intentional homicide rate was 0.72 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the inflow of personal remittances was 0.45 % of GDP , down from 0.86 % in 1990

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 41.58 % of the population , up from 8.2% of the population in 2000 .

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with national statistical plans that are fully funded (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2018 , Republic of Korea does not have national statistical plans that are fully funded.
